content:
Hi all, I am wondering if anyone has experience downloading ERA5 data using the CDS API?
When I test my code to pull a small subset of the data, it sits in the CDS queue for a long time (indefinitely?). I am new to both the CDS API as well as NCAR/HPCs so I am having trouble debugging what is causing the issue.
I believe this was an issue of CDS updating to a new beta API in the last few days!
Meredith Leung has marked this topic as resolved.
